text: @JohnSimpsonNews @peterjukes @realDonaldTrump That's good news if it turns out to be the case. It's a pity that Coronavirus is the necessary catalyst, rather than the good people of the USA reaching the same conclusion, because of his overall unsuitability to lead that great nation.
